subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Travis Trice scored 23 points, and the Spartans overcame second-seeded Virginia the same way they did in the tournament last year, grinding just a bit better.
snippet: Travis Trice scored 23 points, and the Spartans overcame second-seeded Virginia the same way they did in the tournament last year, grinding just a bit better.
